MS MCQs

    Create sales sequences with Sales Insights

    »

    1. What sequences are available for you to connect with a record (Lead/Opportunity)?

      All sequences

      All sequences created by me

      Only active sequences, that were defined for the specific record type.

      Only deactivated sequences, that were defined for the specific record type.


    2. To edit a sequence you need to?

      Disconnect the sequence from all connected records

      Deactivate the sequence

      Both a and b will work

      None of the above


    3. To add a step between two existing steps you need to?

      There is no option to add a step between 2 existing steps.

      Hover between the two activities and click on the ‘+’ icon that will appear.

      Create a new activity at the end of the sequence and drag it between the two existing steps.

      Both b and c will work
